title: Keep Having Audio Issues
body: When I started playing league this morning, from time to time the audio would begin screeching and blurring together, including my friends talking to me on voice chat. This issue only occurs in game. Additionally, everything on the screen freezes whenever this bug happens, so muting the audio didn't solve the issue.

replies.body:
Since your screen freezes during this issue, it's likely that this is caused by a bad driver or a problem with your PC's hardware. I strongly recommend working through our [**System Crash Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) for a list of steps that should help in resolving this.

Please let me know if this caused any change.
I've had all sorts of issues lately with League. One of them has been the audio will just cut out for a bit and then just randomly come back when it feels like.
